org.rakiura.cpn.gui
Interface CPNDecoration

All Known Implementing Classes:
CPNAnnotationFigure, CPNNameFigure, CPNTokenCounterFigure
public interface CPNDecoration

Represents a child figure which is a decoration for CPN figure.

Method Detail

reconnectToParent

void reconnectToParent(org.rakiura.draw.figure.CompositeFigure d)
Reconnects this decoration to its parent, based on the ParentFigureID property.

Parameters:
d - composite figure this decoration and its parent are part of.

getParentFigureID

java.lang.String getParentFigureID()
Returns this decoration parent ID. Used when reconnecting.

Returns:
this decoration parent id.

setParentFigureID

void setParentFigureID(java.lang.String aID)
Sets this decoration parent ID. Used when this decoration data is read from XML serialization.

Parameters:
aID - this decoration parent ID.
